mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_name, member_password, member_phone, email_id, email_domain, join_date, birth, nickname) values (#{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberPhone}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, DATE(now()), #{birth}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select member_name, member_id, member_password, email_id, email_domain, join_date from member order by join_date
